How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Ease of finding/identifying the outcome measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Whether the measurement instrument has been used in similar trials previously

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - How the measurement instrument was developed

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Who developed the measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Relevance of the measurement instrument for your population

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Whether the measurement instrument requires translation for your trial

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Whether there is support for multiple languages when using the measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Cultural sensitivity and appropriateness

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Ease of administration

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The number of items in the measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Length of time for researcher to administer

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Length of time for participants to complete

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Participants comprehensibility of the measurement instrument (e.g., literacy requirements)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Clinicians comprehensibility of the measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Participants mental ability to complete the measurement

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Participants physical ability to complete the measurement

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Whether the measurement instrument requires specialist training to administer

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Whether the measurement instrument requires specialist equipment/device(s) to administer

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - If a designated place is needed to administer/complete the measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The mode of administration (i.e., in person, online, by phone)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - When the measurement instrument is completed (e.g., in participants own time, during a healthcare visit)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Acceptability of the measurement instrument to clinicians/practice staff

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Acceptability of the measurement instrument to participants

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Costs associated with using the measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - How the instrument handles sensitive information

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Risk of adverse outcomes following use of the measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Ease of score calculation

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The types of analyses that can be conducted with the data obtained

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - Likelihood of significant findings from using the measurement instrument

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The response format of the measurement instrument (i.e., Likert scale, dichotomous responses)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The recall period for the measurement instrument (i.e., over the past week, month, year)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - How well the measurement instrument reflects the construct being measured (content validity)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The degree to which the measurement instrument is free from measurement error (reliability)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The ability of the measurement instrument to detect change over time (responsiveness)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The degree that scores on the measurement instrument reflect a gold standard, where applicable (criterion validity)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The degree that a translated or culturally adapted measurement instrument adequately reflects the original version (cross-cultural validity)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The degree of interrelatedness among the items in the measure (internal consistency)

How important are the following factors when deciding what outcome measurement instrument(s) to use in a childhood obesity prevention trials?

The following factors relate to all types of outcome measurement instruments - The degree that scores on the measurement instrument reflect the dimensionality of the construct being measured (structural validity)
